title: Antimicrobial properties and biocompatibility of semi-synthetic carbohydrate-based ionic hydrogels
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30719-30731
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05695G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sina Lambrecht, Alina Gazizova, Selin Kara, Johanna Meyer, Stefan Jopp
The biocompatibility of carbohydrate-based ionic hydrogels produced from GVIM-I (glucosyl vinyl imidazolium iodide) was evaluated against several microorganisms and L929 cells to determine to applicability of these hydrogels in the medical field.
